q: She began to ______ doubts about the decision.
Writing music ______ an important place in my life.
His new suit made him look very ______.

His contributions to writing prove that he is a ______ recipient of the Nobel Prize for Literature.
I ______ that book to be too difficult for you to understand.
Charles Dickens is considered to be one of the greatest literary ______.
If you don’t study, the ______ of you passing the test are low.
